translation.eng:
# About Peskas

Peskas is a web portal displaying data and insights on the fisheries of Timor-Leste. It is the official fisheries national monitoring system of Timor-Leste.

Peskas relies on a team of Timorese enumerators collecting catch data from fishers around Timor-Leste. Catch data are matched with vessel tracking data to show fishing trends over time and space.

Peskas was built with the objectives of being low cost, open source, open access and near-real time.

Peskas is the result of an ongoing partnership between WorldFish and the Timor-Leste Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries' Department of Fisheries, Aquaculture and Marine Resources since 2016.

Peskas was made possible with the generous donations of The Royal Norwegian Embassy in Jakarta, The Minderoo Foundation, The CGIAR Big Data Platform and the Schmidt Foundation.

Peskas is funded by the Government of Timor-Leste since 2021 with technical support from WorldFish and Pelagic Data Systems Inc.

Information about the process and user-centred design of the Peskas pipeline and initial analytics, and its application in fisheries research & management can be found in the following publications:

- [PeskAAS: A near real-time monitoring system for small-scale fisheries in Timor-Leste](http://www.fao.org/documents/card/en/c/cb2030en). In A. Tilley & M. B. Roscher (Eds.), Information and communication technologies for small-scale fisheries (ICT4SSF) - A handbook for fisheries stakeholders. In support of the implementation of the Voluntary Guidelines for Securing Sustainable Small-Scale Fisheries in the Context of Food Security and Poverty Eradication (pp. 11–18). FAO; WorldFish.
- [PeskAAS: A near-real-time, open-source monitoring and analytics system for small-scale fisheries](https://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0234760). PloS One, 15(11), e0234760.
- [Nearshore Fish Aggregating Devices Show Positive Outcomes for Sustainable Fisheries Development in Timor-Leste](https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fmars.2019.00487/full). Frontiers in Marine Science, 6, 487."
translation.tet:
# About Peskas

Peskas is a web portal displaying data and insights on the fisheries of Timor-Leste. It is the official fisheries national monitoring system of Timor-Leste.

Peskas relies on a team of Timorese enumerators collecting catch data from fishers around Timor-Leste. Catch data are matched with vessel tracking data to show fishing trends over time and space.

Peskas was built with the objectives of being low cost, open source, open access and near-real time.

Peskas is the result of an ongoing partnership between WorldFish and the Timor-Leste Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries' Department of Fisheries, Aquaculture and Marine Resources since 2016.

Peskas was made possible with the generous donations of The Royal Norwegian Embassy in Jakarta, The Minderoo Foundation, The CGIAR Big Data Platform and the Schmidt Foundation.

Peskas is funded by the Government of Timor-Leste since 2021 with technical support from WorldFish and Pelagic Data Systems Inc.

Information about the process and user-centred design of the Peskas pipeline and initial analytics, and its application in fisheries research & management can be found in the following publications:

- [PeskAAS: A near real-time monitoring system for small-scale fisheries in Timor-Leste](http://www.fao.org/documents/card/en/c/cb2030en). In A. Tilley & M. B. Roscher (Eds.), Information and communication technologies for small-scale fisheries (ICT4SSF) - A handbook for fisheries stakeholders. In support of the implementation of the Voluntary Guidelines for Securing Sustainable Small-Scale Fisheries in the Context of Food Security and Poverty Eradication (pp. 11–18). FAO; WorldFish.
- [PeskAAS: A near-real-time, open-source monitoring and analytics system for small-scale fisheries](https://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0234760). PloS One, 15(11), e0234760.
- [Nearshore Fish Aggregating Devices Show Positive Outcomes for Sustainable Fisheries Development in Timor-Leste](https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fmars.2019.00487/full). Frontiers in Marine Science, 6, 487."
translation.por:
# Sobre Peskas

Peskas é um portal web que apresenta dados e insights sobre as pescas de Timor-Leste. É o sistema oficial de monitorização nacional das pescas de Timor-Leste.

Peskas conta com uma equipe de recenseadores timorenses que coletam dados de captura de pescadores em Timor-Leste. Os dados de captura são combinados com os dados de rastreamento da embarcação para mostrar as tendências de pesca ao longo do tempo e do espaço.

Peskas foi construído com o objetivo de ser de baixo custo, código aberto, acesso aberto e tempo quase real.

Peskas é o resultado de uma parceria contínua entre a WorldFish e o Departamento de Pescas, Aquicultura e Recursos Marinhos do Ministério da Agricultura e Pescas de Timor-Leste desde 2016.

Peskas foi possível com as doações generosas da Embaixada Real da Noruega em Jacarta, da Fundação Minderoo, da Plataforma de Big Data CGIAR e da Fundação Schmidt.

A Peskas é financiada pelo Governo de Timor-Leste desde 2021 com apoio técnico da WorldFish e Pelagic Data Systems Inc.

Informações sobre o processo e design centrado no usuário do gasoduto Peskas e análise inicial, e sua aplicação na pesquisa e gestão pesqueira podem ser encontradas nas seguintes publicações:

- [PeskAAS: A near real-time monitoring system for small-scale fisheries in Timor-Leste](http://www.fao.org/documents/card/en/c/cb2030en). In A. Tilley & M. B. Roscher (Eds.), Information and communication technologies for small-scale fisheries (ICT4SSF) - A handbook for fisheries stakeholders. In support of the implementation of the Voluntary Guidelines for Securing Sustainable Small-Scale Fisheries in the Context of Food Security and Poverty Eradication (pp. 11–18). FAO; WorldFish.
- [PeskAAS: A near-real-time, open-source monitoring and analytics system for small-scale fisheries](https://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0234760). PloS One, 15(11), e0234760.
- [Nearshore Fish Aggregating Devices Show Positive Outcomes for Sustainable Fisheries Development in Timor-Leste](https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fmars.2019.00487/full). Frontiers in Marine Science, 6, 487."

translation.eng: * All values in metric tonnes. Totals only include data after April 2018.
translation.tet: * All values in metric tonnes. Totals only include data after April 2018.
translation.por: * Todos os valores em toneladas métricas. Os totais incluem apenas dados após Abril de 2018.
Copyright © 2021 Peskas. Todos os direitos reservados.
Relatório de pesca em pequena escala

translation.eng: Tracks are recorded by GPS devices mounted on the boats. Data refer to the boats' movements tracked along the Timor coast with a grid resolution of 10 x 10 meters. Some tracks may be inaccurate.
translation.tet: Tracks are recorded by GPS devices mounted on the boats. Data refer to the boats' movements tracked along the Timor coast with a grid resolution of 10 x 10 meters. Some tracks may be inaccurate.
translation.por: As trilhas são registradas por dispositivos GPS montados nos barcos. Os dados referem-se aos movimentos dos barcos rastreados ao longo da costa de Timor com uma resolução de grelha de 10 x 10 metros. Algumas faixas podem ser imprecisas.

translation.eng: These estimates have not been thoroughly validated and might be inaccurate. There is some uncertainty on all data used in the calculations. Estimates, even from previous years, may be updated whenever new data is available. Indicators only include data from artisanal and subsistence fisheries.
translation.tet: These estimates have not been thoroughly validated and might be inaccurate. There is some uncertainty on all data used in the calculations. Estimates, even from previous years, may be updated whenever new data is available. Indicators only include data from artisanal and subsistence fisheries.
translation.por: Essas estimativas não foram totalmente validadas e podem ser imprecisas. Existe alguma incerteza em todos os dados usados nos cálculos. Estimativas, mesmo de anos anteriores, podem ser atualizadas sempre que houver novos dados disponíveis. Os indicadores incluem apenas dados da pesca artesanal e de subsistência.

translation.eng: These estimates have not been validated and might be inaccurate. Use with caution.
translation.tet: Estimasaun hirak ne'e seidauk hetan validasaun nune'e bele inexata. Uza ho kuidadu.
translation.por: Essas estimativas não foram validadas e podem ser imprecisas. Use com cuidado.

translation.eng: The estimated total catch from fishing trips. To illustrate the uncertainty around this estimate, values are rounded to two significant digits.
translation.tet: The estimated total catch from fishing trips. To illustrate the uncertainty around this estimate, values are rounded to two significant digits.
translation.por: A captura total estimada em viagens de pesca. Para ilustrar a incerteza em torno dessa estimativa, os valores são arredondados para dois dígitos significativos.

translation.eng: The total catch is estimated by multiplying the estimated catch per trip (nationally or per taxa) by the average number of trips per boat and by the number of boats.
translation.tet: The total catch is estimated by multiplying the estimated catch per trip (nationally or per taxa) by the average number of trips per boat and by the number of boats.
translation.por: A captura total é estimada multiplicando a captura estimada por viagem (nacionalmente ou por taxa) pelo número médio de viagens por barco e pelo número de barcos.

translation.eng: The average trip value is obtained from landing surveys at multiple sites around the country. Fishers are asked for the estimated price of their catch at the landing site regardless of whether the catch is deemed for sale or consumption. Prices may change throughout the year and across landing sites. We then obtain monthly estimates using a random-effect statistical model.
translation.tet: The average trip value is obtained from landing surveys at multiple sites around the country. Fishers are asked for the estimated price of their catch at the landing site regardless of whether the catch is deemed for sale or consumption. Prices may change throughout the year and across landing sites. We then obtain monthly estimates using a random-effect statistical model.
translation.por: O valor de pouso é obtido a partir de pesquisas de pouso em vários locais em todo o país. Os pescadores são questionados sobre o preço estimado de sua captura no local de desembarque, independentemente de a captura ser considerada para venda ou consumo. Os preços podem mudar ao longo do ano e nos locais de pouso. Em seguida, obtemos estimativas mensais usando um modelo estatístico de efeito aleatório.

translation.eng: Survey answers are filtered for outliers. We consider outliers to be those values that are beyond 3 times the median absolute deviation of the log-transformed landing selling prices.
translation.tet: Survey answers are filtered for outliers. We consider outliers to be those values that are beyond 3 times the median absolute deviation of the log-transformed landing selling prices.
translation.por: As respostas da pesquisa são filtradas por outliers. Consideramos outliers os valores que estão além de 3 vezes o desvio absoluto mediano dos preços de venda de desembarque transformados em log.

translation.eng: Occasionally, and especially before 2019, the total selling price of the catch has been recorded incorrectly. This problem is likely to occur when the price is entered per fish or only for part of the catch. There may be a delay of up to several weeks between the time a landing occurs and the time information enters the system.
translation.tet: Occasionally, and especially before 2019, the total selling price of the catch has been recorded incorrectly. This problem is likely to occur when the price is entered per fish or only for part of the catch. There may be a delay of up to several weeks between the time a landing occurs and the time information enters the system.
translation.por: Ocasionalmente, e especialmente antes de 2019, o preço de venda total da captura é registrado incorretamente. É provável que este problema ocorra quando o preço é inserido por peixe ou apenas para parte da captura. Pode haver um atraso de várias semanas entre o momento em que ocorre o pouso e o momento em que a informação entra no sistema.

translation.eng: The average catch per trip is obtained from landing surveys at multiple sites around the country. Enumerators observe the catch and record the length distribution for each taxon caught. We then use the length data to estimate the equivalent weight using publicly available length-weight relationship coefficients. Finally, we obtain monthly estimates using a random-effect statistical model.
translation.tet: The average catch per trip is obtained from landing surveys at multiple sites around the country. Enumerators observe the catch and record the length distribution for each taxon caught. We then use the length data to estimate the equivalent weight using publicly available length-weight relationship coefficients. Finally, we obtain monthly estimates using a random-effect statistical model.
translation.por: A captura média por viagem é obtida de pesquisas de desembarque em vários locais do país. Os enumeradores observam a captura e registram a distribuição do comprimento de cada táxon capturado. Em seguida, usamos os dados de comprimento para estimar o peso equivalente usando coeficientes de relação comprimento-peso disponíveis publicamente. Por fim, obtemos estimativas mensais usando um modelo estatístico de efeito aleatório.

translation.eng: Catch lengths and the number of individuals are filtered for outliers. We consider outliers those values that are beyond 3 and 7 times the median absolute deviation of the log-transformed lengths and number of individuals respectively. Length-weight relationships are obtained from [FishBase](https://www.fishbase.de/). For each taxon, we use the average for all species present in East Timor or Indonesia.
translation.tet: Catch lengths and the number of individuals are filtered for outliers. We consider outliers those values that are beyond 3 and 7 times the median absolute deviation of the log-transformed lengths and number of individuals respectively. Length-weight relationships are obtained from [FishBase](https://www.fishbase.de/). For each taxon, we use the average for all species present in East Timor or Indonesia.
translation.por: Os comprimentos de captura e o número de indivíduos são filtrados quanto a valores discrepantes. Consideramos outliers os valores que estão além de 3 e 7 vezes o desvio absoluto mediano dos comprimentos transformados em logaritmo e do número de indivíduos, respectivamente. As relações comprimento-peso são obtidas em [FishBase] (https://www.fishbase.de/). Para cada táxon, usamos a média de todas as espécies presentes em Timor-Leste ou na Indonésia.

translation.eng: The length and number of caught individuals can be imprecise. Taxa are not always correctly identified by enumerators. In addition, taxa are generally grouped at the family or genus level whereas length-weight coefficients are generally available at the species level. This greatly reduces the accuracy of the species-based length-weight coefficients used.
translation.tet: The length and number of caught individuals can be imprecise. Taxa are not always correctly identified by enumerators. In addition, taxa are generally grouped at the family or genus level whereas length-weight coefficients are generally available at the species level. This greatly reduces the accuracy of the species-based length-weight coefficients used.
translation.por: O comprimento e o número de indivíduos capturados podem ser imprecisos. Os taxa nem sempre são identificados corretamente pelos enumeradores. Além disso, os táxons são geralmente agrupados em nível de família ou gênero, enquanto os coeficientes de peso-comprimento estão geralmente disponíveis em nível de espécie. Isso reduz muito a precisão dos coeficientes de peso-comprimento baseados em espécies usados.

translation.eng: The number of boats is derived from information obtained in the 2015 East-Timor census. The number of boats in each municipality level is added together to form the national total.
translation.tet: The number of boats is derived from information obtained in the 2015 East-Timor census. The number of boats in each municipality level is added together to form the national total.
translation.por: O número de barcos é calculado a partir de informações obtidas no censo 2015 de Timor-Leste. O número de barcos em cada nível de município é somado para formar o total nacional.

translation.eng: Data have not been updated since 2015. The data are currently unreliable. DGP are currently registering fishing vessels. This process should be complete in early 2022.
translation.tet: Data have not been updated since 2015. The data are currently unreliable. DGP are currently registering fishing vessels. This process should be complete in early 2022.
translation.por: Os dados não são atualizados desde 2015. No entanto, o número de barcos provavelmente mudou consideravelmente desde então.

translation.eng: The number of trips per boat is obtained from the [Pelagic Data Systems](https://www.pelagicdata.com/) tracking data. Boat movements are tracked, and a proprietary algorithm is used to determine when a trip occurs. Estimates are obtained by averaging the number of trips a boat makes over a month.
translation.tet: The number of trips per boat is obtained from the [Pelagic Data Systems](https://www.pelagicdata.com/) tracking data. Boat movements are tracked, and a proprietary algorithm is used to determine when a trip occurs. Estimates are obtained by averaging the number of trips a boat makes over a month.
translation.por: O número de pousos por barco é obtido nos dados de rastreamento da [Pelagic Data Systems](https://www.pelagicdata.com/). Os movimentos do barco são rastreados e um algoritmo proprietário é usado para determinar quando ocorre uma viagem. As estimativas são obtidas pela média do número de viagens que um barco faz ao longo de um mês.

translation.eng: Trips are filtered for outliers and some potential algorithm errors. Specifically, we do not take into account trips where the presumed duration is longer than 18 hours or covers a distance over 60km.
translation.tet: Trips are filtered for outliers and some potential algorithm errors. Specifically, we do not take into account trips where the presumed duration is longer than 18 hours or covers a distance over 60km.
translation.por: As viagens são filtradas quanto a valores discrepantes e alguns erros de algoritmo em potencial. Especificamente, não levamos em consideração viagens em que a duração presumida seja superior a 18 horas ou cobre uma distância superior a 60 km.

translation.eng: There are known problems with the Pelagic Data systems algorithm. On some occasions, trips are not detected by the system, multiple trips are merged into one, or a single trip is split into several. In addition, poor network coverage might delay or prevent information from being transferred from the tracking devices. The extent or severity of these problems is unknown. Currently, it is not possible to distinguish fishing trips (that result in a landing) from non-fishing trips.
translation.tet: There are known problems with the Pelagic Data systems algorithm. On some occasions, trips are not detected by the system, multiple trips are merged into one, or a single trip is split into several. In addition, poor network coverage might delay or prevent information from being transferred from the tracking devices. The extent or severity of these problems is unknown. Currently, it is not possible to distinguish fishing trips (that result in a landing) from non-fishing trips.
translation.por: Existem problemas conhecidos com o algoritmo de sistemas de Dados Pelágicos. Em algumas ocasiões, as viagens não são detectadas pelo sistema, várias viagens são mescladas em uma ou uma única viagem é dividida em várias. Além disso, uma cobertura de rede ruim pode atrasar ou impedir que as informações sejam transferidas dos dispositivos de rastreamento. A extensão ou gravidade desses problemas é desconhecida. Atualmente, não é possível distinguir as viagens de pesca (que resultam em um desembarque) das viagens que não são de pesca.

translation.eng: Boat movements are tracked by [Pelagic Data Systems](https://www.pelagicdata.com/) tracking system, and a proprietary algorithm is used to determine when a trip occurs.
translation.tet: Boat movements are tracked by [Pelagic Data Systems](https://www.pelagicdata.com/) tracking system, and a proprietary algorithm is used to determine when a trip occurs.
translation.por: Os movimentos do barco são rastreados pelo sistema de rastreamento [Pelagic Data Systems](https://www.pelagicdata.com/), e um algoritmo proprietário é usado para determinar quando ocorre uma viagem.

translation.eng: The tracks are filtered for outliers and some potential algorithm errors. Specifically, we do not take into account geo-referenced tracks characterized by large anomalies in the quality of the tracking, in the speed of the boats, and in the distance and time travelled.
translation.tet: The tracks are filtered for outliers and some potential algorithm errors. Specifically, we do not take into account geo-referenced tracks characterized by large anomalies in the quality of the tracking, in the speed of the boats, and in the distance and time travelled.
translation.por: As faixas são filtradas para valores discrepantes e alguns possíveis erros de algoritmo. Especificamente, não levamos em consideração trilhas georreferenciadas caracterizadas por grandes anomalias na qualidade do rastreamento, na velocidade das embarcações, na distância e no tempo percorrido.

translation.eng: There are known problems with the Pelagic Data systems algorithm. On some occasions, trips are not detected by the system, multiple trips are merged into one, or a single trip is split into several. In addition, poor network coverage might delay or prevent information from being transferred from the tracking devices. The extent or severity of these problems is unknown. Currently, it is not possible to distinguish fishing trips from the non-fishing trips.
translation.tet: There are known problems with the Pelagic Data systems algorithm. On some occasions, trips are not detected by the system, multiple trips are merged into one, or a single trip is split into several. In addition, poor network coverage might delay or prevent information from being transferred from the tracking devices. The extent or severity of these problems is unknown. Currently, it is not possible to distinguish fishing trips from the non-fishing trips.
translation.por: Existem problemas conhecidos com o algoritmo de sistemas Pelagic Data. Em algumas ocasiões, as viagens não são detectadas pelo sistema, várias viagens são mescladas em uma ou uma única viagem é dividida em várias. Além disso, uma cobertura de rede ruim pode atrasar ou impedir que as informações sejam transferidas dos dispositivos de rastreamento. A extensão ou gravidade desses problemas é desconhecida. Actualmente, não é possível distinguir as viagens de pesca (que resultam num desembarque) das viagens de não pesca.

translation.eng: The estimated total value from fishing trips. To illustrate the uncertainty around this estimate, values are rounded to two significant digits.
translation.tet: The estimated total value from fishing trips. To illustrate the uncertainty around this estimate, values are rounded to two significant digits.
translation.por: A receita total estimada dos desembarques de pesca. Para ilustrar a incerteza em torno dessa estimativa, os valores são arredondados para dois dígitos significativos.

translation.eng: The total value is estimated by multiplying the estimated value per trip by the average number of trips per boat and by the number of boats.
translation.tet: The total value is estimated by multiplying the estimated value per trip by the average number of trips per boat and by the number of boats.
translation.por: O valor total é estimado multiplicando o valor estimado por viagem pelo número médio de viagens por barco e pelo número de barcos.

translation.eng: The taxa (species or groups of species) are recorded by enumerators at the landing site.
translation.tet: The taxa (species or groups of species) are recorded by enumerators at the landing site.
translation.por: Os táxons (espécies ou grupos de espécies) são registrados pelos recenseadores no local de desembarque.

translation.eng: We calculate national catch for the eleven most common taxa by weight.
translation.tet: We calculate national catch for the eleven most common taxa by weight.
translation.por: Calculamos a captura nacional para os onze táxons mais comuns por peso.

translation.eng: The categorisation of taxa has changed over time. Prior to April 2019, taxa were recorded at the species level. Later, taxa were grouped into about 60 categories that loosely correspond to the species family or genus. It is not known how this change might affect the estimates.
translation.tet: The categorisation of taxa has changed over time. Prior to April 2019, taxa were recorded at the species level. Later, taxa were grouped into about 60 categories that loosely correspond to the species family or genus. It is not known how this change might affect the estimates.
translation.por: A classificação dos táxons mudou ao longo do tempo. Antes de abril de 2019, os táxons foram registrados em nível de espécie. Mais tarde, os táxons foram agrupados em cerca de 60 categorias que correspondem vagamente à família ou gênero da espécie. Não se sabe como essa mudança pode afetar as estimativas.
